actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code for the purpose of removing the restriction on the use of recording clocks to record time of employees of executive departments in the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Repeals the prohibition of the use of recording clocks to record the time of an employee of an Executive department in the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code for the purpose of removing the restriction on the use of recording clocks to record time of employees of executive departments in the District of Columbia.
